content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f601 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e worsted merino superwash hand dyed mistake rib stitch hat to fit kids adult approximate circumference 19 ¾ 21 ½ materials worsted merino superwash hand dyed 1 1 100g skein color 107 blue oreo gauge 18 sts 24 row = 4 using us size 8 5mm needles in mistake rib stitch after blocking needles us size 7 4 5mm 8 5mm - 16 circular size 8 5mm dpns 1 st marker m pattern is written for smallest size with larger sizes in parenthesis if only one number is given it applies to all sizes mistake rib stitch multiple of 4 sts round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * round 2 k1 *p2 k2 repeat from * end p2 k1 repeat these 2 rnds for pattern st begin with smaller circular needle long tail co 88 96 sts join in the round and pm work in 2x2 rib k2 sts p2 sts for 8 rnds switch to larger circular needle work in mistake rib st starting with round 2 for 6 ¼ 7 ¼ decrease rnds switch to dpns round 1 *k2 k2tog repeat from * around 66 72 sts round 2 *k1 k2tog repeat from * around 44 48 sts round 3 *k2tog repeat from * around 22 24 sts round 4 *k2tog repeat from * around 11 12 sts cut yarn and draw through rem sts weave in all ends ©2014 plymouth yarn company 091914vle designed by vanessa ewing abbreviations co= cast on decrease = decrease dpns= double pointed needles k = knit p = purl pm= place marker rem= remaining round=round rs= right side sl = slip st s = stitch es decrease = together
